summary: From human to khajiit plus power
descriptionHtml:
Belrand is a follower that you can find in Solitude at Winking Skeever. He\\\'s a warrior - magician.
I change his race (from human to khajiit) and change his armor and power.
Installation: Put on main data skyrim file data Belrand\\\'s esp and bsa.
Unistall: Go to Main skyrim file data and delete Berland\\\'s esp and bsa.

Enjoy it ;)
Mod Raccomanded: Cover Khajiits female / male
author: Nephae
